name: Rashnu
title: Rashnu - Persian Mythology
subtitle: Yazata of Justice and Judgment
longDescription:
Yazata of Justice and Judgment

The divine judge who weighs souls at the Chinvat Bridge, holding golden scales to measure good and evil deeds.
